glsa.title: Clam AntiVirus: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Clam AntiVirus can lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Clam AntiVirus is an open source (GPL) anti-virus toolkit for UNIX, designed especially for e-mail scanning on mail gateways.

description.p: A heap-based buffer overflow exists in the cli_scanpe function in libclamav/pe.c in ClamAV.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition via a specially crafted file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Clam AntiVirus users should upgrade to the latest version:
